Text: RE EGAS th QtrTracy Do you want all corp request to come thru to you We get many requests that are not earnings related from Corp Development RAC investors relations etc I can also just copy you on schedules that Im sending out Please let me know Thanks Original Message From Geaccone Tracy Sent Tuesday October PM To Sommers Jeffrey E Cc Tran Agatha Subject RE EGAS th Qtr Thank you Stan and Rod are looking to me to coordinate all these new companies we picked up Its easier to track if it all comes through one place Original Message From Sommers Jeffrey E Sent Tuesday October PM To Geaccone Tracy Cc Tran Agatha Subject RE EGAS th Qtr Okay I didnt send Mark anything new as the number I gave him came from our nd CE with adjustments for the things transferred in and out of EGAS Agatha and I will coordinate with you in the future Sommers Original Message From Geaccone Tracy Sent Tuesday October AM To Sommers Jeffrey E Lindsey Mark E Schwarzbach Stephen Cc Tran Agatha Hughes James A Hayslett Rod Subject RE EGAS th Qtr Please make sure your numbers go through me or Stan before we give them to Corp Corps request for these things should be coming through me in the future Rod and I are meeting with Stan on Monday October We would like to discuss your th Q numbers then if possible Let me know Thanks Tracy Original Message From Sommers Jeffrey E Sent Tuesday October AM To Lindsey Mark E Schwarzbach Stephen Cc Tran Agatha Hughes James A Hayslett Rod Geaccone Tracy Subject EGAS th Qtr Mark In response to your voicemail this morning this is EGAS th Qtr per the nd CE It has been adjusted to pull out the items that have been transferred out of EGAS since the nd CE Azurix International and South America Merchant and the transfer in of European Assets and the Middle East This does NOT include EPower which I understand will be transferred from Europe to EGAS in the th Qtr We are currently working on our rd CE and will send you those numbers when we are done Sommers File EGASthqtrxls

FW Plan Allocations from ENA to Other Business UnitsFYI This must have been the fifth version already for us Original Message From Leschber Edie Sent Tuesday October PM To West Terry Smith Jeff E Talley Darin Cockrell Rainier Galvan Michael S Spoede Amy Smith Kirk Vargas Hope Ruffer Mary lynne Roquemore Tobey Massey Rachel Moryl Heidi Wood Stephen Copeland Erin Tran Agatha Pierce Jody Free Darryl S Geaccone Tracy Helton Susan Cc Killen Faith Subject Plan Allocations from ENA to Other Business Units Attached please find an updated allocations schedule which now reflects in a separate line the planned IT Infrastructure Allocation related to each support department that will be passed on to each Business Unit from ENA for Also attached is related support Thanks Edie

RE EGAS Plan Cc GregStephen Our Europe and Middle East projects has also changed significantly following Jim Hughes trip to Europe Well rework the numbers with Cuiaba also and forward that to Tracy tomorrow Thanks Original Message From Tran Agatha Sent Monday October AM To Adams Gregory Kaster MeiLing Cc Schwarzbach Stephen Subject RE EGAS Plan Greg It does reflect the consolidation of Cuiaba except that Cuiaba number is changing significantly We hope to update for that by tomorrow Original Message From Adams Gregory Sent Monday October AM To Kaster MeiLing Tran Agatha Cc Schwarzbach Stephen Subject EGAS Plan Importance High Agatha MeiLing Does the current version of the plan you submitted reflect the consolidation of Cuiaba In particular the impact on Interest Expense Capital Expenditures for If you need to make changes please get them to us ASAP Thanks Greg Adams Director Corporate Financial Planning

RE REQUEST Operating Expenses High Priority Cc Heres our best estimate Please let me know if you have questions Original Message From Schwarzbach Stephen Sent Tuesday October AM To Geaccone Tracy Tran Agatha Killen Faith Lee Dana Smith Stephanie Davis Rachel A Vargas Hope Evans Stephen Sparger Bob Smith Jeff E Myers Thomas Ueckert Allen W Copeland Erin Selzer Howard Boyd Mike Smith Kirk Roper Kerry Galvan Michael S Wood Stephen West Terry Cc Lindsey Mark E Subject REQUEST Operating Expenses High Priority Hello everyone I know that most if not all of you are busy with quarter close Plan and possibly Board of Directors presentations and that this is not the ideal time to have more added to your plate However in conjunction to with setting the Plan targets the Office of the Chairman has asked to see an analysis of operating expenses by business unit with some level of detail and with quick turnaround To that end and to expedite this request in an efficient manner and hopefuly save you some work corporate accounting has already prepared a summary of operating expenses by business unit by category for the eight months ended August These categories correlate very closely with the most often used accounts in SAP cost element groups ie salaries benefits outside services etc This information ties to your rollup in CS Some categories have many accounts mapped to them and we have provided the mapping employed by corporate for you to follow column AO What we are asking you to do is as follows Review the attached schedule for the eight months ended first sheet ExpensesYTD August Corporate has highlighted in yellow various amounts that warrant some additional explanation Please provide an explanation for these highlighted amounts You may do so in any format you choose at the bottom with a footnote additional schedule etc As you may remember doing earlier this year with the Plan please take your total expenses YTD and categorize them by function We have provided a list of the most common functions in this file but if you need to add functions for clarity please do so Corporate gave thought to using the SAP alternate hierarchies to do this but concluded that each BU should have input on this as you will know the most appropriate hierarchies to use and any other adjustments to make if needed Considering what has been incurred through August and what the remainder of the year holds for your BU please project your total operating expenses by both category and by function Please fill in the second sheet in the file ExpensesSepDec with your projections and review the totals sheet Total Year Estimate Keep in mind that this exercise is meant to be your best estimate at this time of these items given the quick turnaround time and not an exhaustive project We realize that this is the best estimate at this time and understand that these numbers may change for a variety of reasons If you have any questions please call me at x or Terry West at x And finally this needs to be completed and returned to me by pm this Wednesday October Thank you Steve File Aug GA estxls

FW EGAS Budget followup itemsTracy Is there such a thing that we need to do for you If yes could I get the template from you I dont think our GA will change Thanks Original Message From Howes Carol Sent Tuesday October PM To Sommers Jeffrey E Tran Agatha Subject RE EGAS Budget followup items One item which falls under Item at the meeting Rod said that they have standard G A graph template that they use Agatha you should probably see if you can get something from Tracy Original Message From Sommers Jeffrey E Sent Tuesday October PM To Tran Agatha Howes Carol Subject EGAS Budget followup items While I had a free minute I was trying to remember the action items from the EGAS Plan review with Horton I will list what I can remember but please edit and add as needed Roll forward from nd CE to plan by asset Updated Cuiaba numbers Updated European Numbers including E Power Final Currency Reserve number from Louie Fisher current million place holder An ExposuresIssues Currently Managing Schedule by Project see attached schedule format Coordinate the format of EGAS Lay presentation with the rest of ETS Revised Asset Sale slide from Fisher File exposuresxls Sommers

FW plan other operating expense detailsTracy FYI Ag Original Message From Tran Agatha Sent Monday October AM To Schwarzbach Stephen Cc Sommers Jeffrey E Kaster MeiLing Subject plan other operating expense details Per your request Please let me know if you have further questions Thanks

weekly forecast to Corp Cc Tracy Attached is the th quarter forecast for EGAS It is essentially Q from CE This does not include gainloss on assets sale which right now it would be Greenfield Shipping loss and EcoElectrica gain Ill find out the latest for those numbers Please forward this to Steven Schwarzbach if everything looks OK Thank you
Q CE vs CE reconciliations Cc Per your request Please let me know if you have questions Thanks

THANK YOUDear Mr Lay I just want to send you a note to say thank you for all youve done for Enron Ive been with Enron for years straight out of college I may have been impacted financially with what is currently going on but I certainly dont blame you nor anyone for that matter It just is Thanks to Enron I have had a very good job for the last years This might be the only company Ive known but I do have friends that work at other company and this I know Not all companies give employees bonuses stock options ESOP upward mobility matching retirement funds cash accounts competitive salary challenging work environment onsite health care onsite workout place subsidized cafeteria matching gift giving involvement in charitable work and community and many other good things I know that you and Enron have always care for the employees and for the community In this time of crises Im sure there will be criticism no matter what you do but please do not pay attention because your family and friends and Im sure many employees know that you are an honest and classy person with much integrity THANK YOU ALWAYS

cost cutting measures from an Employeeshareholder point of viewDear All The business units are operating on a lean GA budget and cut costs whenever we can and making sure that we are efficient Are there any initiative to do likewise for all corp functions As an accountant in the business unit we received corp allocations The total for corp was more than MM This of course excludes Enron Net Work Enron Property and Global Finance which if we include those the GA to Enron could well be over Billion not counting the business units GA The number just blew me away I think we need to make sure all functions are needed and are run efficiently We cannot say its OK just because we can allocate to the business units because the business units may not receive benefits for these costs We sure dont want Enron as a whole to be growing so fat and so fast that it will hurt our bottom line Im sorry if Im out of line but I really do care about Enron and am very proud to be its employee Thank you for your time

cost cutting measures from an Employeeshareholder point of viewDear All The business units are operating on a lean GA budget and cut costs whenever we can and making sure that we are efficient Are there any initiative to do likewise for all corp functions As an accountant in the business unit we received corp allocations The total for corp was more than MM This of course excludes Enron Net Work Enron Property and Global Finance which if we include those the GA to Enron could well be over Billion not counting the business units GA The number just blew me away I think we need to make sure all functions are needed and are run efficiently We cannot say its OK just because we can allocate to the business units because the business units may not receive benefits for these costs We sure dont want Enron as a whole to be growing so fat and so fast that it will hurt our bottom line Im sorry if Im out of line but I really do care about Enron and am very proud to be its employee Thank you for your time
